title: Follower count distribution on Twitter 2014
summary: This chart shows the Percentage of Twitter users at the Twitter from Number 1-100 to 401-500 .
\\n From the chart we see that the Percentage of Twitter users were 93.68 , at their highest in 1-100 .
\\n The Twitter users slowly declined over the next 3 - 4 Number to 0.36 in 401-500 .
gold: This statistic gives information on the follower count distribution on Twitter . As of April 2014 , 93.68 percent of Twitter users had between 1 and 100 followers on the microblogging site .
